About.about_me_description: With a passion for programming, I constantly seek opportunities to learn, experiment, and apply new technology trends to web products
About.address: District 7, Ho Chi Minh city, Vietnam
About.overview_description_1: Hello! I'm Tuan, a Frontend Developer with over 1.5 years of experience in developing modern web applications. I'm passionate about building user interfaces that are visually appealing, easy to use, and performance-optimized.
About.overview_description_2: I have experience working with React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and React Query, along with the ability to flexibly handle various rendering techniques such as CSR, SSR, SSG, and ISR. In addition, I am also proficient in implementing API Routes, Server Actions, and optimizing SEO for web applications.
About.overview_description_3: In addition to my role as a Frontend Developer, I am also capable of handling certain Backend tasks, including building RESTful APIs, processing business logic, and connecting to databases.
About.overview_description_4: I am always proactive in learning and staying up to date with the latest technology trends to continuously improve both product quality and my own skills. Outside of work, I enjoy reading tech books, playing sports, and traveling to explore new places. I believe that maintaining a healthy work-life balance is essential for sustaining creativity and productivity in my career.
About.title: About

intro-content.paragraph1: This is a portfolio repo extracted from a monorepo I built myself.
list: Components from shadcn and components cloned + customized from various other open-source projects
Tricks and best practices learned during the development process
A collection of useful custom hooks and utilities
Notes and real-world examples for applying to other projects
intro-content.paragraph3: The goal of this repo is both to serve as a personal portfolio and to provide a reusable set of components and tools for future projects.
